सञ्जय उवाच
एवमुक्त्वा ततो राजन्महायोगेश्वरो हरि: ।

translation:
Translation
Sañjaya said: O King, having spoken thus, the Supreme Lord of all mystic power, the Personality of Godhead, displayed His universal form to Arjuna.
